testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin) I should be able to access the list of blood types registered in the system via API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request is sent to the /api/getBloodGroup endpoint with valid authorization information,
testcase.failure:
* The api user sets "api/getNotice" path parameters.........................passed * The api user sends a GET request and saves the returned response..........failed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................skipped * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success"..skipped * The api user verifies the information in the response body for the entry with the specified 0 , including "notice", "noticehospital","null","notice hospital","2024-12-06"..skipped

testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin) I should be able to access the Visitor Purpose List via API connection.
testcase.name: Invalid Token When a GET request is sent to the /api/visitorsPurposeList endpoint with invalid authorization
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/visitorsPurposeList" path parameters...............passed * The api user sends a GET request, saves the returned response, and verifies that the status code is '403' with the reason phrase Forbidden..passed
